Title: Niuzao's Price
Description:
Niuzao owns a statuette which he values greatly: a small icon, in his image, sculpted by one of his long-since fallen sentinels. This statuette was recently stolen by the Sra'thik mantid, and taken to their encampment to our north.

Bring back this statuette. Then we will give you - and your Shado-Pan associate - the answers you seek.
ObjectivesText: Kill the mantid of the Sra'thik Incursion so that Tai Ho can search their bodies for pieces of Niuzao's statuette.
CompletionText: Niuzao does not move quickly, nor does he make rash decisions. Perform his task, and give him time to decide.
RewardText:
Niuzao will be pleased.

Despite his size, our patron is a beast of grace and compassion. He treasured this icon... just as he treasures each of his followers.
